metadata.title: The Missing Merchant
metadata.description: A mysterious disappearance in a peaceful village leads to dark secrets.
metadata.author: Game Dev Team

beats.title: Arrival at Millhaven
beats.description: You arrive at the small village of Millhaven as storm clouds gather overhead.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: You arrive at the small village of Millhaven as storm clouds gather overhead. The cobblestone streets glisten with recent rain, and the villagers hurry past with downcast eyes, avoiding your gaze. There's a tension in the air that has nothing to do with the approaching storm.

dynamicElements.high_reputation: Some villagers nod respectfully as you pass, having heard of your reputation.
dynamicElements.low_reputation: Villagers quickly duck into doorways, clearly wanting nothing to do with you.
dynamicElements.aggressive_approach: Your previous aggressive actions have made the villagers wary and fearful.

quickActions.label: Enter the village peacefully
quickActions.description: Walk into town with a calm, non-threatening demeanor

quickActions.label: Carefully observe your surroundings
quickActions.description: Take time to study the village and its inhabitants

quickActions.label: Loudly demand someone speak with you
quickActions.description: Make your presence known with authority

objectives.description: Find out what happened to the merchant

hiddenTriggers.description: Too many aggressive actions make villagers fearful
hiddenTriggers.narrative: The villagers begin to whisper among themselves, casting fearful glances in your direction.

hiddenTriggers.description: Careful observation reveals the tavern's significance
hiddenTriggers.narrative: Your keen observations point to the tavern as a crucial location in this mystery.

exitConditions.narrative: With initial information gathered, you head toward the tavern where the merchant was last seen.
Your aggressive approach has escalated the situation beyond normal investigation.

beats.title: The Tarnished Tankard
beats.description: The village tavern where the merchant was last seen alive.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: The Tarnished Tankard's heavy wooden door creaks as you enter. The warmth hits you immediately, a welcome relief from the chill outside. A few locals nurse their drinks in shadowy corners, but conversation dies as you step inside. Behind the bar, a red-haired woman watches you with intelligent, measuring eyes.

dynamicElements.high_village_reputation: The tavern keeper greets you with a warm smile, having heard good things about you.
dynamicElements.low_village_reputation: The tavern keeper's expression is guarded, clearly having heard unsavory reports.
dynamicElements.investigation_progress: Your investigative instincts immediately start cataloging details about the room.

quickActions.label: Ask directly about the missing merchant
Examine where the merchant sat
quickActions.description: Look for clues at his usual spot

objectives.description: Discover what happened to Garrett the merchant

beats.title: Tensions Escalate
beats.description: Your aggressive approach has turned the village against you.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: Your aggressive tactics have backfired. Villagers emerge from their homes, some carrying improvised weapons. What started as an investigation has become a standoff. The village elder steps forward, his face grave with concern and anger.

characters.name: Elder Thomsen
characters.description: A weathered man with knowing eyes and the respect of the entire village

initial_meeting.text: Stranger, you arrive at a troubled time. If you're here about Garrett the merchant, tread carefully. Some mysteries are better left buried.

playerOptions.text: Tell me what happened to Garrett
I demand answers about the merchant!

merchant_details.text: Garrett was... different in his final days. Asked strange questions about old stories, places that should be left alone. He vanished three nights past, leaving everything behind. The tavern keeper might know more.

characters.name: Rhea
characters.description: The tavern keeper with sharp eyes and hidden courage

companionAbilities.name: Village Insider
companionAbilities.description: Provides hints about villager moods and local secrets

companionAbilities.name: Healing Herbs
companionAbilities.description: Can provide minor healing using local plants

items.name: Garrett's Ledger
items.description: A leather-bound book with recent transactions and increasingly frantic personal notes

items.name: Elder's Token of Trust
items.description: A carved wooden medallion showing you have the elder's blessing

endings.title: The Village Hero
endings.description: You save the village and become a local legend
endings.narrative: Your heroic actions have saved Millhaven. The villagers celebrate your victory, and Elder Thomsen formally welcomes you as an honorary member of the community. Garrett the merchant is found alive, and the supernatural threat is ended forever.

characterFates.village_elder: Becomes your lifelong friend and advisor
characterFates.tavern_keeper: Names a drink after your heroic deeds

consequences.playerLegacy: Remembered as the Hero of Millhaven

endings.title: The Truth Uncovered
endings.description: You solve the mystery through careful investigation
endings.narrative: Through methodical investigation, you piece together the truth behind Garrett's disappearance. While not everyone survives, you've ensured the mystery won't claim future victims.

endings.title: Driven from the Village
endings.description: Your aggressive approach has made you unwelcome
endings.narrative: Your heavy-handed tactics have turned the entire village against you. You're forced to leave Millhaven with more questions than answers, and Garrett's fate remains unknown.

toneProgression.act1: mysterious and foreboding, building tension through investigation and social dynamics
toneProgression.climax: intense resolution based on player's investigative approach and village relationships

aiGuidance.playerAgency: Always allow creative solutions beyond the quick actions. Reward both careful investigation and bold action, but with different consequences. Players should feel their approach matters.
aiGuidance.mechanicsHandling: Never mention numbers or stats directly. Describe reputation through NPC reactions: 'The villagers eye you warily' instead of 'reputation -10'. Show investigation progress through available information and new options.

responseToPlayerMood.aggressive: NPCs become defensive, some information becomes harder to access, but intimidation may work on weaker characters
responseToPlayerMood.diplomatic: More information becomes available through dialogue, NPCs more willing to help
responseToPlayerMood.investigative: Careful observation reveals additional clues and hidden options
responseToPlayerMood.impatient: Rushing may miss important details but can prevent some negative events

encouragedElements: Village social dynamics and reputation consequences
Multiple approaches to the same investigative challenges
Meaningful choice consequences that affect story progression
forbiddenTopics: Graphic violence beyond fantasy adventure levels

functionCalls.name: updatePlayerStats
functionCalls.description: Update player's hidden stats based on actions and investigation progress

parameters.village_reputation: number (-100 to 100) - how villagers perceive player
parameters.investigation_progress: number (0 to 20) - advancement in solving the mystery
parameters.merchant_clues: number (0 to 15) - clues discovered about Garrett's fate

restrictions: Don't change reputation by more than 30 points in a single action
Aggressive actions should have cumulative negative effects

examples.situation: Player speaks respectfully to village elder
Player threatens a villager for information
